customer_reviews.title: Stops Lipstick Bleed
customer_reviews.text: In general, I have had good experiences using Anastasia Beverly Hills products. The lip primer did not disappoint! I would say that the price is fair for what you get. It's not cheap but not overly expensive either. Increasing in age sometimes brings on unwanted effects. Bleeding lipstick unfortunately is one of them. I read the reviews on this product and decided to try it. WOW it works great! It is not greasy nor waxy. It feels smooth on my lips. The best thing however is that IT STOPS LIPSTICK BLEED! If you have the same problem, this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Stampjazz

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews stated, it feels great going on, and keeps color well. I couldn’t believe I put it on this morning, lipsticked up as usual, and WOW. My lipstick didn’t bleed, feather, etc. all morning long. It even makes whatever lipstick you're wearing look better. Not surprised because I like this line and generally don’t buy cheap cosmetics anyway. Well worth the money.

product_meta.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills Lip Primer
product_meta.description: A sheer, lightweight formula that moisturizes and prepares lips for color. Use Anastasia Beverly Hills Lip Primer to prevent pigment from fading, flaking, or feathering.
feature_bullets: A colorless, lightweight primer that hydrates, smoothes and preps lips, creating the perfect canvas for pigment.
Prevents color from fading and feathering
Ideal for layering underneath Lip Gloss, Liquid Lipstick or Matte Lipstick
Can also be used alone as a hydrating lip conditioner
Creates a hydrated canvas for matte lip color to adhere to, yet pigment still remains ultra-matte
